Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing an investigation by the public service commission during a declared state of emergency
Summary: Authorizes an investigation by the public service commission during a declared state of emergency to review the performance of the Long Island power authority and any of its service providers in restoring service or otherwise meeting the requirements of the emergency response plan during an emergency event.
LawCode: Amd ยง1020-s, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing an investigation by the public service commission during a declared state of emergency
